Headline: #63W West 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Mayfield
ShortDescription: 63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63W West 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Central, 65th, Austin, and 63rd due to, street blockage near 63rd/Mayfield.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.  Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
